name: soda-pop
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 60 HP.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A fizzy soda drink
that restores HP
by 60 points.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A fizzy soda drink
that restores HP
by 60 points.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A fizzy soda drink.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 60 points.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A fizzy soda drink.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
60 points.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A fizzy soda drink.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
60 points.

A fizzy soda drink.

60 points.

A fizzy soda drink.

A fizzy soda drink.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A highly carbonated soda drink.
When consumed, it restores
60 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A highly carbonated soda drink. When consumed,
it restores up to 50 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
A highly carbonated soda drink. When consumed,
it restores up to 50 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A highly carbonated soda drink. It can be used to
restore 50 HP to a single Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A highly carbonated soda drink. It can be used to
restore 50 HP to a single Pokémon.
